TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewButtonColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 承载一个 对象集合。

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是类的专用类型， 用于以逻辑方式承载响应简单用户输入的单元格。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that respond to simple user input. 在中，每个都与 它相交。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每个单元格 (UI) 提供类似于控件的用户界面 。Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a control. 若要为每个单元格显示相同的按钮文本，请将 属性设置为， `true` 并将 属性设置为所需的按钮文本。To display the same button text for every cell, set the property to `true` and set the property to the desired button text. 此列类型的默认排序模式为 。The default sort mode for this column type is . 若要响应用户按钮单击，请处理 或 事件。To respond to user button clicks, handle the or event. 在事件处理程序中，可以使用 属性来确定按钮列中是否发生了单击。In the event handler, you can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in the button column. 您可以使用 属性来确定按钮单元中是否发生了单击，而不是列标题上。You can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in a button cell and not on the column header. > [!NOTE] > 启用视觉样式后，将使用绘制按钮列中的按钮 ，并且通过属性（如）指定的单元样式 不起作用。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a , and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 对特定行执行操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to perform actions on particular rows. 在此示例中， 事件处理程序首先确定按钮单元上的单击是否为，然后检索与该行关联的业务对象。In this example, a event handler first determines whether a click is on a button cell, then retrieves a business object associated with the row. 此示例摘自 [如何： Access Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell "下拉列表](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list)中的对象中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

para.span: 当从 派生类派生并向其添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

related.span: 如何：禁用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的按钮列中的按钮

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的构造函数将 此属性初始化为新创建的 。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元模板的属性不会立即影响用户界面 (列的现有单元的 UI) 。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 这些更改仅在重新生成列后才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过对方法的调用 ) 进行排序。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 查看雇员的销售额。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 单元模板用于将相同的颜色应用于所有按钮。A cell template is used to apply the same color to all buttons. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法复制按钮单元的列。Use this method to duplicate a column of button cells.

span.span: The value of the property is .

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保还复制已添加到派生类的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的默认值具有的初始 属性值 。The default returned by this property has an initial property value of . 此值将覆盖在控件的属性中指定的值 ，但可能会被其他单元格样式属性重写。This value overrides the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). > [!NOTE] > 启用视觉样式后，将使用 通过属性指定的和单元格样式（如不起作用）来绘制按钮列中的按钮 。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. summary.span: 获取或设置列中按钮单元格的平面样式外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat-style appearance of the button cells in the column.

value.span: 一个 值，指示列中按钮的外观。

span.span: A value indicating the appearance of the buttons in the column.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定列中单元格的外观。The property specifies the appearance of the cells in the column. 有关详细信息，请参见 枚举。For more information, see the enumeration. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性 。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 查看雇员的销售额。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在按钮单元格上的默认文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the default text displayed on the button cell.
A that contains the text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为属性值包含在列中的每个都 `true` 显示该 单元格按钮上的属性值。Each contained in the column that has as a property value of `true` displays the property value on the cell's button. 如果有关联的 控件，则更改此属性将刷新列显示。If there is an associated control, changing this property refreshes the column display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 查看雇员的销售额。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to view the sales an employee has made. 属性用于设置列标题。The property is used to set the column header. 此示例是类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示 属性值是否显示为此列中单元格的按钮文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.

value.span: 如果 属性值显示在列中的按钮上，则为 ；如果每个单元格的 属性值都显示在它的按钮上，则为 。

span.span: if the property value is displayed on buttons in the column; if the property value of each cell is displayed on its button.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 按钮单元格的显示为按钮上的文本。By default, the of a button cell is displayed as the text on the button. 属性允许您设置每个单元的按钮文本，或为 所有按钮单元使用属性值。The property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the property value for all of the button cells. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置 由属性返回的对象的属性 。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置 列中每个单元格的属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#010)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#010)]

span.span: The value of the property is .
